name: Tales of: Sena
description:
EXPERIENCE THE STORY:

Tales of: Sena is an Exploration/ Story type game, where you take the role
of the young girl Sena in the loved top down angle!

🡲 Walk through a beautiful 8bit pixel world and explore/ interact with objects
🡲 Start a talk with unique characters!
most of them will even talk back ...
🡲 Look at the environment, Sena will always have something to say about it

CHAPTER 1 - THE HUB

OTHER STUFF YOU CAN DO:


🡲 A CHALLENGING PLATFORMER WITH MANY LEVELS TO EXPLORE!
🡲 A CLICKER TYCOON!
🡲 WORKING INGAME TV!
🡲 EVEN A DATING SIMULATOR!
...wait what?

THERE ARE A LOT OF PLACES TO EXPLORE!

such as...

Woods
➜ Beautiful nature with a lot of green!
➜ A lot of nice people live there too!
➜ With a frog somewhere aswell...



Family House
➜ Very colorful and a happy place!
➜ Good and bad memories are everywhere!
➜ With a locked shed in the garden!



Hub
➜ Balances the life beyond!
➜ Soulworms love it here!
➜ A dirty and useless whole!
(Trust me)
